products.Name: Arcos Lounge Chair- Natural
products.Body:
This lounge chair is crafted from solid Oak, finished with a catalyzed polyurethane finish for maximum durability.  The design is simple, clean, yet dominating in any room with its oversized back support.  Comfortable and quality joinery made to last a lifetime.  

Cushions crafted in a high quality oatmeal coloured upholstery fabric.

products.Name: Pillars- Side Table- Wood
products.Body: Our Pillars side table design crafter in solid Oak wood.  As a detail, the 3/4" thick top includes an X detail carved into it.   The legs are lathe turned at a 3" diameter.

products.Name: Arcos Lounge Chair- Black
products.Body: This lounge chair is crafted from solid Oak, finished with a black stain and a catalyzed polyurethane finish for maximum durability.  The design is simple, clean, yet dominating in any room with its oversized back support.  Comfortable and quality joinery made to last a lifetime.

products.Name: Pillars- mesa auxiliar
products.Body:
A minimal, industrial side table, ideal for holding your beverage of choice. 3mm Laser cut metal laminate combined with 3" round metal legs.  

30cm top, 59cm high.

products.Name: Geometrics 001- Coffee Table
products.Body:
Geometric shapes colliding together to create both a functional furniture piece and a display of art.   This is the first (and only piece) in a series we hope to expand on more in the future.  

Crafted with solid Parota wood.  This is a unique one-off piece (there only exist one)

products.Name: Arcos Chair
products.Body:
The seat and back of this chair is CNC cut from high quality Ash plywood.  The leg structure is built from solid Ash wood.  The back leg support piece is cladded with 1/16th brass laminate which adds a decorative feature and compliments the wood.   The chair is finished with a highly durable polyurethane finish to withstand heavy use.

Seat Height- 18" / 46cm

Total Height- 30" / 76cm

products.Name: Arcos Table - 4-6 seater
products.Body:
This table seats 4-6 people.  The table top is built from high quality Ash plywood.  It's CNC cut to perfection in a wonderful oval shape.  The leg structure is built from solid Ash.   The piece is finished with a highly durable polyurethane finish to withstand heavy use.

**Note**  Chairs not included, table ONLY. 

Height- 30.5" / 77.5 cm

Length- 78"/ 198 cm

Depth- 34" / 86.5 cm

products.Name: Arcos Table - 2-4 seater
products.Body:
This table seats 2-4 people.  The table top is built from high quality Ash plywood.  The leg structure is built from solid Ash wood.   The piece is finished with a highly durable polyurethane finish to withstand heavy use.

**Note**  Chairs not included, table ONLY. 

Height- 30.5" / 77.5 cm

Length- 30.5"/ 77.5 cm

Depth- 30.5" / 77.5 cm

products.Name: Arcos Coffee Table
products.Body:
This coffee table is built from solid Ash wood.  The legs are wood-turned at a 4.5cm diameter.  The table is finished with a highly durable polyurethane finish to withstand heavy use.

Height- 18" / 46cm

Length- 32"/ 81cm

Depth- 16" / 40.5cm

products.Name: Arcos Stool- High
products.Body:
The top seat of this stool is CNC cut from high quality Ash plywood.  The leg structure is built from solid Ash wood.  The two foot supports are cladded with 1/16th brass laminate which adds both a decorative feature and a functional feature of protecting the wood from wear and tear.   The piece is finished with a highly durable polyurethane finish to withstand heavy use.

Height- 30" / 76cm

products.Name: Arcos Stool- Low
products.Body:
The top seat of this stool is CNC cut from high quality Ash plywood.  The leg structure is built from solid Ash wood.  The piece is finished with a highly durable polyurethane finish to withstand heavy use.  This piece can be incorporated into many situations including table stool and side table. 

 

Height- 18" / 46cm

products.Name: Live Edge mirror table
products.Body: This mirror table is a unique piece, meaning that there only exist one !  Is was crafted from a live edge piece of Mesquite wood that was carefully selected for its shape and colors.  We designed the metal base to be thin a minimal to contrast with the robust slab of wood.  The concept for use is a make-up / jewelry table, or an entry mirror table.

products.Name: Reflektor Cube
products.Body: The latest addition to our Reflektor mirror series, the Reflektor Cube is essentially a large version of our Reflektor Mini cube mirror.  Build from 3/4" angle metal, and 1/4" round metal which created the 3D effect.  Finished with black electrostatic paint, and 3mm glass mirror.

products.Name: Reflektor Mini Mirrors (set of 3)
products.Body: A collection of 3 mirror designs, sold as a set.  These mirrors have an electro static painted metal frame that protrudes from the wall, which creates a play on the reflection.  When viewed from directly in front, a three dimensional shape is seen- a cube, a cone, or a triangle.  When viewed from an angle, a whole different reflection is visible.  A great wall decoration for any space in your house.

products.Name: Horrizon Mountain Mirror
products.Body:
This unique design serves as both a decorative and functional piece.  Built with a 18mm MDF frame and a 3mm mirror wrapped with a metal trim.   The mountain featured in the print is called Mount Currie located in the small town of Pemberton, British Columbia, Canada.  

Comes in two sizes 17.5" and 22" Diameter.

products.Name: Horrizon Mountain Mirror
products.Body:
This unique design serves as both a decorative and functional piece.  Built with a 18mm MDF frame and a 3mm mirror wrapped with a metal trim.   The mountain featured in the print is called Mount Currie located in the small town of Pemberton, British Columbia, Canada.  

Comes in two sizes 17.5" and 22" Diameter.

made-to-order.Name: Esquinero / Corner Planter
made-to-order.Body:
The forgotten corner in your room just became your new favorite place.  The hand-welded steel base is finished with a electrostatic paint, the 2" Parota wood shelf can hold books or other knick-knacks that you’ve collected. There’s more: it also includes a black pot to hang your favorite plant.

(100cm wide, 145cm high, 50cm deep)  (39"wide, 57" high, 20" deep)

made-to-order.Name: V Chair
made-to-order.Body: The V chair has a powder coated steel frame for high impact resistance and durability.  The seat and backrest area is crafted from solid wood.  We offer a variety of wood types including- Ash, Poplar and Parota.  Designed for use in both a residential and commercial environment.
